GSD.description:
xen/netfront: fix leaking data in shared pages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.10 by commit 6d98cf6e58b5867225c3b4ea49bc431895ef33f0. For more details please see the references link.
